name: Super 56
storyline: Eons ago, SUPER 56 was banned by the Government of Pain and all copies were buried in the Samsara Desert. Cartridges have now been spotted in independent gaming stores throughout Hell. Roommates Kronos and Brones secured their own copy of the game and challenged their neighbor to a high-scoring bet. But, it turns out they're pretty bad at video games. It’s up to you to achieve an S Rank and shut the pesky neighbor up once and for all.
summary: Super 56 challenges players to overcome 56 genre-bending mini-games with the press of a single button. Compete in daily challenges, earn achievements, and destroy high scores. Outlandish chaos awaits you in Hell!
